==Sun Solaris==
==Sun Solaris==
*lofiadm - [[Solaris (operating system)|Solaris]] command to manage files as block devices. Use to create a loopback device for an ISO image file suitable for mounting with <code>lofiadm -a /path/to/iso /dev/lofi/<em>X</em></code>. Mount the loopback device as a randomly accessible [[file system]] with <code>mount -F hsfs -o ro /dev/lofi/<em>X</em> /mnt/point</code>. Alternatively, use this combined format: <code>mount -F hsfs -o ro `lofiadm -a /path/to/iso` /mnt/point</code>.
*lofiadm - [[Solaris (operating system)|Solaris]] command to manage files as block devices. Use to create a loopback device for an ISO image file suitable for mounting with <code>lofiadm -a /path/to/iso /dev/lofi/<em>X</em></code>. Mount the loopback device as a randomly accessible [[file system]] with <code>mount -F hsfs -o ro /dev/lofi/<em>X</em> /mnt/point</code>. Alternatively, use this combined format: <code>mount -F hsfs -o ro `lofiadm -a /path/to/iso` /mnt/point</code>.
  +   +
